extension.liveshare.sessionDetails.title: Session Details
extension.liveshare.contacts.title: Contacts
extension.liveshare.createlink.title: Create a Reusable Session link
extension.liveshare.displayName.title: Live Share
extension.liveshare.description.title: Real-time collaborative development from the comfort of your favorite tools.
extension.liveshare.liveShare.title: Live Share
extension.liveshare.diagnosticLogging.ti: Enables the Visual Studio Live Share output channel.
extension.liveshare.diagnosticMode.title: Enables diagnostic notifications and logs.
extension.liveshare.anonymousGuestApprov: Controls how to handle join requests from anonymous guests.
extension.liveshare.accountProvider.titl: Preferred account provider registered with keychain to use for Visual Studio Live Share sign-in.
extension.liveshare.account.title: Preferred account registered with keychain to use for Visual Studio Live Share sign-in.
extension.liveshare.connectionMode.title: Type of connection used for collaboration; the default (auto) mode prefers a direct connection, but may fallback to a cloud relay if the direct connection failed.
extension.liveshare.nameTagVisibility.ti: Controls when to display a participant's name tag instead of just their cursor.
extension.liveshare.guestApprovalRequire: Controls whether the host needs to explicitly approve guest requests to join collaboration sessions.
extension.liveshare.shareExternalFiles.t: Automatically share external files opened by the host during a collaboration session.
extension.liveshare.joinDebugSessionOpti: Controls how the participant will join incoming shared debug sessions.
extension.liveshare.showInStatusBar.titl: Show or hide the Live Share status bar items.
extension.liveshare.excludedDebugTypes.t: List of debug adapter types to exclude when Live Share attempts to host a debug session.
Width of shared terminal window, characters.
extension.liveshare.sharedTerminalHeight: Height of shared terminal window, characters.
extension.liveshare.features.markdownDes: Controls set of active features. By selecting `insiders`, you agree to the [Pre-Release Software License Terms](https://aka.ms/vsls-license-preview) and [Privacy Statement](https://aka.ms/vsls-privacy).
extension.liveshare.keepAliveInterval.ti: Sets the number of seconds to wait before sending keep-alive messages in an idle session, used to detect abnormal network disconnection. Set to -1 to disable sending keep-alive messages.
extension.liveshare.allowGuestTaskContro: Allow guests to run and terminate workspace tasks.
extension.liveshare.allowGuestDebugContr: Allow guests to start and stop debugging sessions.
extension.liveshare.allowGuestCommandCon: Allow guests to run arbitrary commands via Code Actions (“Quick Fixes”) and CodeLens
extension.liveshare.focusBehavior.title: Specifies how to respond to focus requests from other participants.
extension.liveshare.alwaysFollowHost.tit: Ensures that the session's host is always followed.
extension.liveshare.showReadOnlyUsersInE: Controls visibility of the cursor and highlights for read-only users.
Increases the guest limit from 5 to 30.
extension.liveshare.autoShareTerminals.t: Controls whether terminals are automatically shared with guests (read-only).
extension.liveshare.codeLens.title: Controls whether to show the CodeLens for starting a collaboration session.
extension.liveshare.showVerboseNotificat: Controls whether to show verbose notifications, such as when a guest joins and leaves a session.
extension.liveshare.populateGitCoAuthors: Specifies when to automatically populate your Git commit message with guest attribution (using the Git-co-author trailer).
extension.liveshare.autoShareServers.tit: Controls whether web servers are automatically shared, when started from the integrated terminal or well-known extensions.
extension.liveshare.openSharedServers.ti: Controls whether to automatically open shared servers in your default browser.
extension.liveshare.properties.title: Agent Uri to connect to Live Share services
extension.liveshare.joinedInfo.title: Join Info
extension.liveshare.localPath.title: Local path of workspace
extension.liveshare.pipeName.title: Pipe name to request host services
extension.liveshare.adapterProxy.title: The adapter proxy
extension.liveshare.taskDefinitionsPrope: The unique ID of the remote task.
extension.liveshare.taskDefinitionsExecI: The execution ID indicates the task is associated with a monitor process. If no execution ID specified, this is a user triggered task.
extension.liveshare.comments.reply.title: Reply
extension.liveshare.allowInvites.title: Specifies who to allow session invitations from.
